predicate.note: Frames file for 'target' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison.

example.name: transitive
example.text: But the prospects for legislation that *trace* targets program trading is unlikely anytime soon.

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: Small-lot buying targeted *trace* at incentive-backed issues pushed up the Nikkei.

example.name: active with instrument
example.text: John targeted Mary with a big juicy spitwad.
